meanings.definition: A young woman who enjoys socializing and having fun.
meanings.sent1: The playgirl always brightens up the room with her laughter and energy.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the playgirl of the group because she loves going out and meeting new people.
meanings.sent3: The playgirl decided to throw a party just for fun, and everyone had a great time.
meanings.sent4: Her vibrant personality makes her the playgirl of the town, attracting everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The playgirl's zest for life is contagious, spreading joy wherever she goes.

meanings.definition: A woman who is known for her carefree and flirtatious behavior.
meanings.sent1: The playgirl at the party was the center of attention with her playful and flirty attitude.
meanings.sent2: She has a reputation as a playgirl because of her carefree and charming demeanor.
meanings.sent3: The playgirl casually flirted with everyone at the event, making them all blush.
meanings.sent4: Her carefree spirit and flirtatious nature earned her the title of the playgirl of the town.
meanings.sent5: The playgirl's playful antics make her irresistible to those around her.

meanings.definition: A magazine featuring photographs of attractive women.
meanings.sent1: The playgirl magazine always showcases stunning women in its glossy pages.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys flipping through the playgirl magazine to admire the beautiful models.
meanings.sent3: The playgirl magazine is popular among those who appreciate beauty and fashion.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, the playgirl magazine sets the standard for elegance and allure.
meanings.sent5: The playgirl magazine captures the essence of feminine beauty in every issue.
